Transcript of Hearing or Trial on, 12/9/2009, and Notice of Filing Transcript and Opportunity to Request Redaction of Personal Data Identifiers. Pursuant to Judicial Conference Policy, the transcript will not be electronically available for 90 days from the date of filing of the transcript. During this 90 day period, copies of the transcript may be purchased from the transcription service AV Tronics. The transcript may also be viewed, but not printed, at the public terminals at the office of the clerk. (related document(s) 1017 Minute Entry) Transcript access will be restricted through 3/15/2010.
